participant_1.background:
I made a lot of changes to my diet and exercise habits and I'm proud of my progress.
i spend a lot of time driving my kids to sports events.
my mother has 500 pairs of shoes.
I go running to stay fit and it helps me clear my mind after a long day at work.
i am a librarian in my current job.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy teaching my students about the world and helping them grow into their best selves.
I am looking for a new challenge, as I have already accomplished everything I wanted to with my family business.
I wash my clothes weekly.
i am a runner.
i am applying for publishing jobs.

content.text: Hi! What do you do for work?
I'm a teacher right now, but I'm looking for a new challenge.
Oh, that's cool. I'm a librarian.
I've always loved libraries! I used to go to the library every day after school when I was a kid.
That's great! I love working in a library. It's so peaceful and quiet.
I can imagine! I'm also a runner. I love going for runs to clear my head.
That's awesome! I used to run a lot, but I've been really busy lately and haven't been able to do it as much.
I totally understand. Life gets in the way sometimes.
So, what are you looking for in a new job?
I'm looking for something that's challenging and rewarding. I want to feel like I'm making a difference in the world.
That's great! I'm sure you'll find something perfect for you.
